crawlers.name: Axial SCX10 Deadbolt 4WD RC Rock Crawler
crawlers.description: Perfect for all levels of experience.Fast for a rock crawler!Body work and colour is great

crawlers.name: Redcat Racing Everest 10 Electric Rock Crawler
crawlers.description: Suitable for beginners but easy to upgrade.Good value for money.Performs well out of the box

crawlers.name: Redcat Racing Everest Gen7 Pro RC Rock Crawler
crawlers.description: Tough and capable straight out of th e box.Powerful and fun.Lots of extra features you don’t get with other cheaper rock crawlers

crawlers.name: Exceed RC MaxStone RC Rock Crawler
crawlers.description: Good price for the standard and quality.Strong protection for both gears and drive shafts.A competition level crawler

crawlers.name: Exceed RC MadTorque Rock Crawler
crawlers.description: Awesome design.Good suspension.Seriously fun to watch it tackle all types of terrain!

crawlers.name: Axial RR10 Bomber RC Rock Racer
crawlers.description: DIY so get to know the mechanics of the vehicle properly.Fun to build and great quality product.Easy to upgrade

crawlers.name: Gmade 51011 R1 RC Rock Crawler Buggy
crawlers.description: Cool, slightly different design.Performs well on all terrains.Easy to customize

crawlers.name: RGT 1/24 Scale Rock Crawler Adventurer
crawlers.description: Great starter crawler for kids and beginners.Pretty speedy for the size!.Includes everything you need to have fun straight out the box

crawlers.name: RGT 1/10 Scale RC Crawlers Off Rock Cruiser
crawlers.description: Great design – very realistic.LED headlights and taillights.Lots of room for upgrades

crawlers.name: DOUBLE E ZK-01 RC Monster Truck Rock Crawler
crawlers.description: Easily climbs and scales rocks at speed.The perfect Christmas or birthday present for kids.Great value
